title: Amazing Animals
description: Test your knowledge about the animal kingdom!

questions.question: What is the largest land animal?
questions.explanation: African elephants are the largest land animals, weighing up to 14,000 pounds!

questions.question: Dolphins are mammals.
questions.explanation: Yes! Dolphins breathe air, give birth to live young, and nurse their babies with milk.

questions.question: Which animal can sleep standing up?
questions.explanation: Horses can lock their legs to sleep standing up! This helps them escape predators quickly.

questions.question: A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'.
questions.explanation: It's true! A group of flamingos is called a flamboyance - a perfect name for these colorful birds!

questions.question: How many hearts does an octopus have?
questions.explanation: Octopuses have 3 hearts! Two pump blood to the gills, and one pumps it to the rest of the body.

questions.question: Penguins can fly.
questions.explanation: Penguins cannot fly through the air, but they are amazing swimmers! They 'fly' through water instead.

questions.question: What is a baby kangaroo called?
questions.explanation: A baby kangaroo is called a joey! They live in their mother's pouch for about 6 months.

questions.question: Butterflies taste with their feet.
questions.explanation: Butterflies have taste receptors on their feet! When they land on a plant, they can taste it instantly.
